name: Arboreal Grazer
oracle_text:
Reach
When this creature enters, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Ash Barrens
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Axebane Guardian
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.

name: Big Score
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Bountiful Landscape
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Forest, Island, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {G}{U}{R} ({G}{U}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: Safe havens amid the desert and dragonstorms, Abzan fortresses attract merchants, travelers, outcasts, and exiles.

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Consider
oracle_text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

name: Contaminated Aquifer
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.
flavor_text: The caves stretch farther than anyone knows, and the terrible legacy of Yawgmoth lurks in every shadow.

name: Crashing Drawbridge
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Northern Beacon flared, and even before the drawbridge finished its descent, the knights charged out."
—*Legend of the Gilded Knights*

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Deceptive Landscape
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Plains, Swamp, or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {W}{B}{G} ({W}{B}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Deep Analysis
oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

name: Draconic Lore
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: The wyrmling studied the ancient carvings and dreamed of a day when her own exploits would be immortalized in stone.

name: Faithless Looting
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Forbidden Alchemy
oracle_text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Foreboding Landscape
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Forest, or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {B}{G}{U} ({B}{G}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Goblin Electromancer
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: The Jeskai find potential recruits among all walks of life, including other clans.

name: Grapple with the Past
oracle_text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

name: Grisly Salvage
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

name: Harrow
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: No spot in nature is truly barren.

name: Haunted Mire
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
This land enters tapped.
flavor_text: Some of the nature spirits and wraiths that haunt Urborg take offense at the term "ghost town."

name: Izzet Signet
flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Kodama's Reach
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Opt
oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

name: Orzhov Signet
flavor_text: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

name: Perilous Landscape
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Island, Mountain, or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {U}{R}{W} ({U}{R}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Preordain
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Radiant Grove
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
This land enters tapped.
flavor_text: Yavimaya's inhabitants are dedicated to protecting its unspoiled jungle from the scourge of artifice.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Satyr Wayfinder
oracle_text: When this creature enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

name: Selesnya Signet
flavor_text: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Plains, or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Enchant creature

name: Springbloom Druid
oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The House's geography constantly warps and twists, fields melting into floorboards and walls opening into hungry maws.

name: Think Twice
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Wall of Roots

Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on this creature: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Mana grows and changes like the roots of a plant. Like a plant, it must be nurtured."
—Nissa Revane

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Druids hold certain plants to be sacred and use their leaves and wood as a spellcasting focus.
